title: BanG Dream! ガルパ☆ピコ～大盛り～

search.name: BanG Dream! 少女乐团派对! ☆PICO
search.overview: 在少女乐队们之间，不为人熟知的那个圣地——LIVEHOUSE「CiRCLE」之上，变成萌萌三头身的少女乐队们，再度集结！「Poppin'Party」「Afterglow」「Pastel＊Palettes」「Roselia」「Hello, Happy World!」，同样的乐队成员们再次来到这个舞台，拯救这里的危机！

search.overview: The series will explore an alternate universe to the main series, and will focus on Kouji Ibuki, an antagonist in the Cardfight!! Vanguard Movie: Neon Messiah, and Suiko Tatsunagi.
